Notes: Report 1: Game loads fine to the title screen. Once you press start and enter the staging area, game still seems fine. Once you walk over to the spot to begin a new game and press the "A" button, the game freezes on the loading screen with a black background and bubbles. Report 2: The game boots and progresses to the new game hub in the Krusty Krab, but selecting the "New Game" option causes the game to lock up on the bubble loading screen. Same applies for watching any of the videos in the "Extras" menu.
